doc:
Valentine Dyall https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valentine_Dyall 0 Valentine Dyall (7 May 1908 – 24 June 1985) was an English character actor. His distinctive voice made him especially popular as a voice actor and he was known for many years as "The Man in Black", the narrator of the BBC Radio horror series Appointment with Fear. Valentine_Dyall ( 7_May_1908 – 24_June_1985 ) was an_English_character_actor . His_distinctive_voice made him especially_popular as a_voice_actor and he was_known for many_years as " The_Man in Black_" , the_narrator of the_BBC_Radio_horror_series_Appointment with Fear .
